iati-activity.title: Rural WASH in Tsiroanomandidy District
iati-activity.description: WaterAid is supporting the provision of water, sanitation and hygiene education in two rural municipalities or communes (Tsinjoarivo Imanga and Bevato) in Tsiroanomandidy District, in the Bongolava region of Madagascar. Between 2015 and 2018 we will reach 35,404 people with safe water, and 8,870 people with improved latrines and hygiene.
iati-activity.participating-org: Plateforme de Fédération des Personnes Handicapées
iati-activity.activity-date: Date that project is due to end
Date that project started to the nearest quarter

contact-info.mailing-address: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
